Comprehensive maintenance service for SIVE fixed deployments in Santa Cruz de Tenerife and from Las Palmas. LOT 2: Atlantic-Strait Zone. Comprehensive maintenance service for SIVE fixed deployments in Cádiz, Algeciras, Huelva, Ceuta and Pontevedra. LOT 3: Southeast Zone. Comprehensive maintenance service for SIVE fixed deployments Malaga, Granada, Almería and Murcia. LOT 4: Levante Zone Comprehensive maintenance service for SIVE fixed deployments in Alicante, Valencia, Castellón, Tarragona and the Balearic Islands. LOT 5: Support services for the logistics management of the contract. This Lot It includes services of a transversal nature to the rest of the Lots that complement the management, control and monitoring capabilities of the provisions of the contracted services. In order to avoid possible conflict of interest in the execution of this Lot, the company that bids for this Lot will not be able to submit an offer for the rest of the lots. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: WATER CONSORTIUM OF TARRAGONA. Summary: Floculant Dosage and Effluent Quality Control Per Line. Description: The object of the contract is the "DOSING OF FLOCULANT AND CONTROL OF THE QUALITY OF THE EFLUENT PER LINE" to improve the pretreatment of the purification process with the improvement of the dosage and control of the quality of the effluent from the flocculation stage individual decantation for each of the 10 process lines, given that it is a phase system, of the individual effluent showing totally different results.<br> The following specific improvements are also planned to be implemented:<br> - Exhaustive control of the dosage of the flocculant per individual line to be able to dose the amount exact amount of reagent by the individual flow rate of each line.<br> - Improve the current dosing pumping system by adding variable flow pumps and a skid with different combinations to ensure dosing at all times.<br> - Control of the quality of the individual effluent per line.<br> Finally A more exhaustive quality control is also required per treatment line through the installation of multi-parametric analyzers to obtain a continuous reading of the quality of the individual effluent.<br> "FLOCCULANT DOSAGE AND EFFLUENT QUALITY CONTROL PER LINE" for improve the pretreatment of the purification process by improving the dosage and quality control of the effluent from the flocculation stage individual decantation for each of the 10 process lines, given that a phase system, of the individual effluent showing result.... Published Date: 2025-11-20. Closing Date: 2025-12-22. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: WATER CONSORTIUM OF TARRAGONA

Description: It constitutes the set of instructions, standards and specifications for the SUPPLY, INSTALLATION, IMPROVEMENT and MAINTENANCE work of the NEW CCTV SYSTEM FOR THE LOGISTICS AREA OF SEVILLE.<br> Currently, the facility has a system made up of a set of cameras of different sizes. technology, analogue predominating over digital. The infrastructure as a whole presents deficiencies and serious operating problems, having become obsolete. Over time, they have been executed<br> various partial interventions without a unified standardization criterion, which has affected the coherence and operability of the system, preventing optimal use of the available technological capabilities.<br> This action aims to provide an integrated technical solution for general improvement, aiming to have a comprehensive CCTV system with benefits adequate to our needs during the coming years.<br> Doc Title: SUPPLY, INSTALLATION, IMPROVEMENT and MAINTENANCE OF THE NEW CCTV SYSTEM FOR THE LOGISTICS AREA OF SEVILLE<br> Contract Type: supplies.
